meet anna.Text: ... so really, ma belle, I think it imperative that you reconsider your choice.
Please, Felix. I've told you many times already. My decision is final.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Your decision has been made with greate haste, Belle. Perhaps I could -

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Anna! And Felix... oh, sorry, are we interrupting something?

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Oh! Good afternoon, Kai. And who might you be?

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: I'm... Elm. I'm Kai's friend.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Yes! A new friend. I'm showing them around the village.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Elm! What a splendid name. It reminds me of... green... nature... leaves...

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: Try trees.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Yes! Precisely. Trees. I will call you Tree. I think it suits you quite well.

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: That's my last name, actually.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: So what were you two talking about just now?

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Ah... well. Felix here was just running his little campaign speel for me. Again.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Ah.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: This village has been without a mayor for a week now. We're falling into shambles!

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Someone needs to reassume power now. And if no one else is going to do it, it may as well be me.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Do you not think so, young Tree?

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: (Ah. I'd almost forgotten about everything with the mayor.)

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: Uh... I guess?

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Don't mind him, Elm.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: Hmph. Well, heed my word, Belle. I'll let you return to your work now.

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Actually I can't.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Can't what? Return to your work?

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Yes. I can't find my horse-riding permit. Perhaps it got stolen.

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: ... Horse? Horse-riding permit? Do people steal those in this village??

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Maybe. Regardless, I can't send out these exports without it.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Oh no. Everyone really is losing everything today.

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Everyone?

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: I lost my hunting knife this morning and Hank's animal feed got misplaced.

meet anna.Name: Felix
meet anna.Text: What did I say! The town's falling into shambles. We're falling apart.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Not for long, we aren't! Elm's been helping out. They're really good at finding things.

meet anna.Name: Kai
meet anna.Text: Maybe we can help you, Anna!

meet anna.Name: Anna
meet anna.Text: Really? That would be amazing. I'd like to get this shipment out as soon as possible.

meet anna.Name: Elm
meet anna.Text: Of course.

end permit fb.Name: Elm
end permit fb.Text: (Oof. I feel better than last time, but I still feel like I got sucker-punched in the gut.)

end permit fb.Name: Elm
end permit fb.Text: (That aside -- did Felix really steal the permit?)

end permit fb.Name: Kai
end permit fb.Text: Ah! The Elm-patented Face Of Fatigue. What's your guess?

end permit fb.Name: Kai
end permit fb.Text: I'll come with. I want to see if you're right.
